Adversary¶

At present, the adversary has just a single pertubation method - FGSM. This works by computing the sign function of the derivative of network’s cost function over the original image.

class adversary.Adversary(model, epsilon, limits=(-1, 1))[source]¶

A PyTorch implementation of adversarial attacks.

fgsm(x, y, i=-1)[source]¶

An implementation of the Fast Gradient Sign Method, used to carry out attacks at a pixel level on the image, based upon the gradient of the image’s cost function.

Parameters:
  • x (Tensor) – The original image to perturb
  • y (int) – True label of the original image
  • i (int) – Indexer, only used for plotting and not necessary. Should plotting not be required, just set i<0
Returns:

Perturbed version of the original image
Return type:

Tensor
